resources.string: %% if called with a format, of % only if not
ADD 1%% generated $/s for every other recipes, and reduces the cost of this recipe by 5%% per tier%s
ADD 2%% generated $/s for every %s, and reduces the cost of this recipe by 5%% per tier
ADD 10%% generated $/s on shake per tier%s
ADD 150%% generated $/s per tier and add 20%% generated $/s%s
